content: this sock pattern is designed for sock madness 19 in 2025 when the sock madness is finished it will available for the public with this pattern i want to thank all those wonderful people who organize and run events like sock madness the world would be much less colourful without you cuff-down scrap eater without weaving in threads because they are braided light and dark scraps or colourful and basic coloured scraps lead to best results it can be made in several different sizes nearly anything multiple by 4 foot length can be adjusted easily invisible decreases at the gusset and the toe beautiful with and without fringes written instructions + charts anora had an idea for another version of the fringes she added little knots at the threads to double-secure them thank you
